label: SearchIndexerDataUserAssignedIdentity
description: Specifies the identity for a datasource to use.

fields.label: User Assigned Identity
fields.tooltip: The fully qualified Azure resource Id of a user assigned managed identity typically in the form "/subscriptions/12345678-1234-1234-1234-1234567890ab/resourceGroups/rg/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/myId" that should have been assigned to the search service.
